content:
Hello :wave:

I started suddenly having RA panics on my rust CUDA project on any functions that use attrs from cuda_std
Screenshot_511.png

Is this a known issue?

I knew my gpu code was cursed but i didnt know it was so bad as to crash rust analyzer :(

your issue is most likely: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/10772

if you are on a nightly version of 1.58 you'll need to bump to at least nightly-2021-11-16!
Oh boy, this is going to be interesting since my project only works on specific nightly versions... time to bump rustc i guess :sweat_smile:
